title: Sheshan Abeysekara
summary: Sheshan Abeysekara is a Digital Commerce Specialist who has worked on various projects. He has a passion for crafting digital workplace solutions and coordinating impactful projects. He has experience in software engineering and is currently working as a freelance consultant.
brief_summary: Sheshan Abeysekara is a Digital Commerce Specialist with experience in software engineering and project consulting.
